author: djrtwo
content:
Warning! If you are working on v0.12.1 update, please make sure that you are computing the attestation subnet lookahead correctly
<@!491624610215886849> pointed out that we modified in the validator guide to _publish_ messages using the new calculation but not to _find peers_ using the new calculation. 

fix/clarification here:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/1876
